statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Gualtemala Antigua coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.30} per pound with some House coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${14.50} per pound to create \displaystyle{10} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${13.24} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound.
